problem.markdown:
>>They replaced the original sandwich maker with a new sandwich maker whose average sandwich-making time was 25 seconds (The original sandwich maker took 29 seconds on average to prepare a sandwich. What is the average number of customer in the shop at any given time? (Enter 3 decimal places)<<
= 1.641 +- 0.05

numericalresponse.label: They replaced the original sandwich maker with a new sandwich maker whose average sandwich-making time was 25 seconds (The original sandwich maker took 29 seconds on average to prepare a sandwich. What is the average number of customer in the shop at any given time? (Enter 3 decimal places)
